name: There Are Two Castles...
description:
The game goal is to destroy the enemy's castle.

Controls:

E and Q to select a unit in the store 

Space to buy a unit

A and D to move the camera.

UI:

On the right, how much wood and stone is in the castle

On the left, how much the selected unit is worth

Gameplay:

Buy peasants to gather resources on the map

Buy Knights and Archers to attack enemy units and the castle

Archers are not able to attack the castle, so be careful when buying them

Also, we didn't have time to do the balance. If the rules allow, we will make an update with balanced units later.
